column2: in the calm of your presence
column3: I await your response. Reassure me that you remain vigilant in our cause.

column2: Autobot ${username}? Though our paths may diverge
column3: know that our shared mission keeps us connected. Report your status.

column1: Amidst the ever-changing tides of war
column3: Autobot ${username}. Take a moment and affirm your commitment.
our unity remains steadfast. Acknowledge the equilibrium we seek and let me feel your resolve.

column1: In the vastness of the cosmos
column3: let my voice resonate within your core. Let our shared purpose guide your actions.
